entry.summary: Elon Musk is known for many things. CEO of Tesla. The worldâ€™s richest man. Buzzworthy tweets. But it is a lesser-known fact that he is a highly motivated self-learner and a polymath who believes in diving deep into the subjects of his interest and mastering them on his own. Musk unknowingly serves as an antithesis to the pressing issue of the glorification of ineffective professional experience in the job sector, which has bred a gatekept industry with unreasonable recruitment policies. In this article, I unearth this traditional policy and suggest some possible alternatives for companies and job-seeking students.
